noBadgesH1: It's time to start earning open badges!
noBadgesExplore: You might explore Webmaker Badges as well as thousands of other offerings from badge issuers.
noBadgesUpload: You can also manually upload any of the open badges you've earned.
remove this badge: Do you want to remove this badge?
need to reconnect: If so, you'd need to reconnect with the issuer ({{badge.attributes.body.badge.issuer.name|e}}) to have this badge sent to your Backpack again.
